Garrick Aden-Buie

I had a great time connecting with old and new friends and colleagues this past week at the INFORMS 2017 Annual Meeting.

I was happy to have been invited by Julie Hammett to present in the Remote Patient Monitoring and mHealth Applications session Wednesday afternoon.

Thanks INFORMS and Houston for a great trip!
